about_the_game:
VRC PRO XTR Long Track pack containing 5 spectacular long lay-outs starting with XTR LT1.

The XTR track is part of the VRC Extreme Racing Complex Complex which is designed and developed by VRC and contains a unique crossing. This opens up numerous spectacular lay-out options. This XTR Long Track pack will eventually contain 5 Long Tracks. The other tracks XTR LT2 till LT5 will be automatically added to this pack when they become available!
detailed_description:
VRC PRO XTR Long Track pack containing 5 spectacular long lay-outs starting with XTR LT1.

The XTR track is part of the VRC Extreme Racing Complex Complex which is designed and developed by VRC and contains a unique crossing. This opens up numerous spectacular lay-out options. This XTR Long Track pack will eventually contain 5 Long Tracks. The other tracks XTR LT2 till LT5 will be automatically added to this pack when they become available!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP 7, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Pixel Shader 2.0 graphics card (nVidia GeForce FX 5600 or ATI Radeon X600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated RAM, Pixel Shader 3.0 graphics card (AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: VRC USB adapter or controller, for hosting multiplayer sessions high upstream connection is recommended

short_description: VRC PRO XTR Long Track pack containing 5 spectacular long lay-outs starting with XTR LT1. The XTR tracks are developed by VRC and contain a unique crossing with spectacular lay-out options. The other tracks XTR LT2 till LT5 will be automatically added to this pack when they become available!
